question: Neelakanta Rao Jagdale passed away in May 2019 in Bengaluru, Karnataka. What was he famous for?
explanation: Neelakanta Rao Jagdale, Chairman & Managing Director of Amrut Distilleries, which was the producer of the Amrut Fusion Single Malt Whisky which ranked as the third finest whisky in the world by Jim Murray in his Whisky Bible. The brand continues to figure among the best whiskies in the world.
